item.title: 机器学习公开课笔记一
item.author: chenjidai@aircas.ac.cn (岱)
item.description: 一、什么是机器学习(what is machine learning?) 1.1 机器学习定义 主要有两种定义： Arthur Samuel (1959). Machine Learning: Field of study that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed. Tom Mitchell (1998) Well-posed Learning Problem: A computer program is said to learn from experience E with respect to
